Control Name: 2.4. Ensure ASC Default policy setting 'Monitor OS Vulnerabilities' is not 'Disabled'
Control Statement: When this setting is enabled, it analyzes operating system configurations daily to determine issues that could make the virtual machine vulnerable to attack. The policy also recommends configuration changes to address these vulnerabilities
